description: This file is a JavaScript module that provides a singleton pattern for initializing and retrieving a Supabase client, configured via environment variables. It exports a single function `getSupabaseClient` that manages the creation and reuse of the client instance, ensuring it's initialized with the appropriate environment variables and handling missing variables gracefully.

methods.name: getSupabaseClient()
methods.description: Returns a singleton instance of the Supabase client, initializing it with environment variables if not already created. It logs a warning if necessary environment variables are missing.
